title: Wisconsin: the good life
creator_credit: Dick Durrance and Dick Durrance Films
brief_description: A survey of Wisconsin - touches briefly the story of the States and the present agricultural and industrial riches. Shows scenes of Milwaukee, an ocean-going port in the heart of the mid-west; Madison, the capital and centre of public life and the varied opportunities for winter and summer sports.
